name: U-Ricky Iwasaki
title: Unjiniyela wesofthiwe
summary: Umthuthukisi wesofthiwe onelwazi, ofuna ithuba elitjha lokusebenzela amaphrojekthi amakhulu. Nginentshisekelo yokwenza nofana ukungezelela ikhodi ukuze abanye bayisebenzise. Ngikholelwa bona amakghono wami mancani nayiqathaniswa ne-inthanethi, njeke nginentshisekelo yokusebenza namanye amathulusi, imisebenzi, amalimi wokuhlela.

experience.title: Unjiniyela wesofthiwe
responsibilities: Yakha begodu yasebenzisa iinsetjenziswa zewebhu ezilinganisekako ngokusebenzisa i-React ne-Node.js
Sisebenzisane nabaphathi bomkhiqizo ukulungisa iimfuneko nokuqinisekisa ukulethwa ngesikhathi
Yathuthukisa begodu yagcina ama-API we-RESTful weensetjenziswa zewebhu
Yakha imitlolo yokwenza imisebenzi izenzekelayo nokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kuhle

experience.title: Umsizi womqeqetshi wethenisi
responsibilities: Ukufundisa amaqhinga wethenisi ngaphakathi kweqembu labadlali abangu-5-10
Ukwenza isifundo sibe mnandi begodu sithabise abadlali
Unomthwalo wokuphepha kwabadlali enkundleni, khulukhulu abadlali abasesebatjha nabadala, njengabaneminyaka emi-3 nabaneminyaka ema-60

experience.title: Umlingani ophumako
responsibilities: Ukusiza amakhasimende bona athole izinto esitolo
Ukugcina indawo yokugcina ipahla ihlanzekile begodu ihlelekile
Ukugcina indawo ephephileko nenobungani yamakhasimende nabasebenzi

projects.name: Iphothifoliyo
projects.description: Iwebhusayithi ephendulako etjengisa amaphrojekthi namakghono ngokusebenzisa ithekhnoloji yesimanjemanje yewebhu
